ISSUE.TITLE: Expo React Native tutorial has some TypeScript compiler errors
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link [Build a User Management App with Expo React Native](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/getting-started/tutorials/with-expo-react-native#create-an-upload-widget) ## Describe the problem 1. The code of `components/Avatar.tsx` has some TypeScript errors. 2. I also encountered [this issue](https://github.com/rnmods/react-native-document-picker/issues/677) and in my own demo I used `expo-document-picker` instead. ## Describe the improvement 1. Add a check and some type conversions. 2. I'm not sure if I should replace `react-native-document-picker` or just wait for the official fix, so I will separate this into another commit. ## Additional context ![errors](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/22171828/51eaa550-d2c8-4dba-89ad-af58a6e81532)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: fix compiler errors for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764
docs: replace `react-native-document-picker` with `expo-document-picker` for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764
docs: replace `react-native-document-picker` with `expo-document-picker` for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764
docs: use `expo-document-picker` for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764

docs: fix code snippets for expo tutorial (#20766) * docs: fix compiler errors for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764 * docs: use `expo-document-picker` for expo react native tutorial https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/20764 * docs: update text to reflect library replacement Co-authored-by: Charis <26616127+charislam@users.noreply.github.com> * expo-react-native: change from rn document picker to expo-image-picker * docs: run prettier for expo tutorial * docs: add missing contentType and fileExt for expo tutorial --------- Co-authored-by: Charis <26616127+charislam@users.noreply.github.com> Co-authored-by: Samir <samir.js.zip@gmail.com>
